creator: sean.mullan@oracle.com
text:
If one of the AVAs in the Issuer DN contains a hex value, ex: "9.99.999=#abc123"
XMLX509IssuerSerial.getIssuerName escapes the leading '#' and returns, ex:
"9.99.999=\#abc123"

It's ok to insert a '\' before the '#' if it is a String value, but not with a hex value, and so inserting a '\' makes it non-compliant with RFC 2253.
